name: MicroMerchantRL
description:
MicroMerchantRL is a prototype for a combatless roguelike that involves trading goods to save up enough money to buy a proper merchant license.  The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic Medieval  world that exists on the back of a turtle. 

Made with assets provided by https://www.kenney.nl/

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • i to open inventory
  • Click on a character to initiate a trade with them
  • Space to enter a tile's location when on the starting world map
  • Exit a location to return to the world map by moving to the edge of the location
